comment._content: Bessie C. Merriam was involved in a society divorce reported in several 1913 New York Times articles.  Her husband (Charlotte's father) was Captain Henry C. Merriam.  Major Clarence Murphy was named as a correspondent.  Henry accused Bessie of trying to shoot him and poison Charlotte.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thanks for your identification of the people in this photograph. They are probably Bessie C. Merriam and Charlotte, wife and daughter of Captain Henry C. Merriam.  We will update the source data and reload the description.
